sys_ui_macro.name: EstimateButtons
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null"> <g2:evaluate var="jvar_showEstimateButtons"> var util = new x_550467_estimate.EstimateUtil(g_form.getUniqueValue(),g_user.userID); var answer = util.validStory(); answer; </g2:evaluate> <g2:evaluate> var buttons = util.validAnswers(); </g2:evaluate>
<j2:if test="$[jvar_showEstimateButtons]"> <j2:foreach var="jvar_buttons" items="${buttons}"> <button id="button_${jvar_buttons}" /> </j2:foreach> </j2:if> </j:jelly>
